content: using a 3rd needle bind off to join the 3 edge stitches on each side see video of how to do this here place the remaining stitch back on the right needle and place a marker on either side this is now the back central stitch and the beginning of round make sure you have the right side facing to start the next round you will have decreased 5 sts so should now have 136 sts pattern in the round round 1 rs sm m1l k to m m1r sm k1 sm round 7 sm m1lp k1 p1 repeat to 1 st bm k1 m1l k to m m1r sm k1 140 sts m1rp sm k1 sm m1lp k1 p1 repeat to 1 st round 2 sm k to m sm k1 sm k to m sm k1 bm k1 m1pr sm k1 152 sts rnds 3 & 4 repeat rnds 1 & 2 144 sts round 8 sm p1 k1 repeat to 1 st bm p1 sm k1 round 5 sm m1lp p to m m1pr sm k1 sm sm p1 k1 repeat to 1 st bm p1 sm k1 m1lp p to m m1pr sm k1 148 sts rnds 9 20 repeat rnds 7 & 8 6 times 176 sts round 6 sm p to m sm k1 sm p to m sm k1 rnds 21 - 22 repeat rnds 5 & 6 once 180 sts edging option 1 round 23 rs sm m1l k to m m1r sm k1 sm round 28 sm p to m sm k1 sm p to m sm k1 m1l k to m m1r sm k1 184 sts round 29 sm m1l k to m m1r sm k1 sm m1l k round 24 sm k to m sm k1 sm k to m sm k1 to m m1r sm k1 196 sts rnds 25 & 26 repeat rnds 23 & 24 188 sts round 30 sm k to m sm k1 sm k to m sm round 27 sm m1lp p to m m1pr sm k1 sm k1 m1lp p to m m1pr sm k1 192 sts option 2 round 23 sm m1l k1 p1 k3 to m m1pr sm k1 round 25 sm m1l k2 p1 k3 to 1 st bm p1 m1r sm m1pl k3 p1 to 1 st bm k1 m1r sm k1 sm k1 sm m1l p1 k3 to last 3 sts p1 k2 m1r 184 sts sm k1 188 sts round 24 sm k2 p1 k3 to 1 st bm p1 sm k1 round 26 sm k3 p1 k3 to 2 sts bm p1 k1 sm sm p1 k3 to last 3 sts bm p1 k2 sm k1 k1 sm k1 p1 k3 to m sm k1 instagram @twinsetandpurl #lorettoroadcowl ravelry jojob ©joanna herriott 2022 round 27 sm m1lp k3 p1 k3 to 2 st bm p1 k1 round 29 sm m1l p1 k3 to 3 st bm p1 k2 m1r m1r sm k1 sm m1l k1
